scripts.transcribe: sh -c 'command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo "uv not found. Install with: brew install uv"; exit 1; }; [ -x .venv/bin/python ] || { echo "Missing .venv. Run: npm run transcribe:setup"; exit 1; }; mkdir -p .cache/matplotlib .cache/fontconfig .cache/huggingface; MPLCONFIGDIR=.cache/matplotlib XDG_CACHE_HOME=.cache HF_HOME=.cache/huggingface HF_HUB_CACHE=.cache/huggingface/hub ./.venv/bin/python scripts/transcribe_sidecars.py "$@"' --
scripts.transcribe:setup: sh -c 'command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo "uv not found. Install with: brew install uv"; exit 1; }; PY=""; for v in 3.12 3.11 3.10; do if command -v python$v >/dev/null 2>&1; then PY=python$v; break; fi; done; if [ -z "$PY" ]; then echo "No supported Python found (need 3.10-3.12). Install with: brew install python@3.12"; exit 1; fi; uv venv --python "$PY" .venv; uv pip install --python .venv/bin/python -r requirements.txt'
